SELECT USER_ID, USER_NM, JOB_GRADE_NM, UPLOAD_COMPLETE_CNT FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT USER_ID, USER_NM, JOB_GRADE FROM TBU_USER_M TUM WHERE TUM.USER_GRADE = 0 AND USER_NM != "이재희"
) A LEFT JOIN TBG_GRADE_C TGC ON A.JOB_GRADE = TGC.CODE ) B LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS UPLOAD_COMPLETE_CNT FROM TBV_VIDEO_REQ_M WHERE STATUS = "COMPLETEUPLOAD" AND UPLOAD_COMPLETE_DT >= CONCAT(#{selectedYear}, '-', LPAD(#{selectedMonth}, 2, '0'), '-01') AND UPLOAD_COMPLETE_DT < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{selectedYear}, '-', LPAD(#{selectedMonth}, 2, '0'), '-01'), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ORDER BY UPLOAD_COMPLETE_CNT DESC) C ON B.USER_ID = C.MANAGER_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBS_SPEND_H ( CRE_ID, SPEND_DT, WHAT_FOR, AMT, NOTE, MANAGER_CHECK ) VALUES ( #{creId}, #{spendDt}, #{whatFor}, #{amt}, #{note}, "N" )
mapper.select: SELECT C.*, D.JOB_GRADE_NM FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.USER_NM AS CRE_NM, B.JOB_GRADE FROM ( SELECT CRE_ID, SPEND_DT, DATE_FORMAT(SPEND_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS STRING_SPEND_DT, WHAT_FOR, AMT, NOTE, MANAGER_CHECK FROM TBS_SPEND_H WHERE SPEND_DT >= CONCAT(#{selectedYear}, '-', LPAD(#{selectedMonth}, 2, '0'), '-01') AND SPEND_DT < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{selectedYear}, '-', LPAD(#{selectedMonth}, 2, '0'), '-01'), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) ORDER BY SPEND_DT DESC ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM TBU_USER_M ) B ON A.CRE_ID = B.USER_ID ) C LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM TBG_GRADE_C ) D ON C.JOB_GRADE = D.CODE
